tasks.instruction: Which of the following scenarios describes 'Weak AI' (also known as Narrow AI)?

questions.question: Which of the following scenarios describes 'Weak AI' (also known as Narrow AI)?
options: An AI like Ultron that is self-aware and develops emotions.
An AI focused solely on a specific task, like AlphaGo playing the game Go.
An AI that can handle any intellectual task a human being can do.
questions.answer: An AI focused solely on a specific task, like AlphaGo playing the game Go.
